amendment.description: To limit the use of funds for converting to contractor performance of Department of Defense activities and functions.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1280 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 1280 proposed by Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S9529-9531, S9563; text: CR S9529) To limit the use of funds for converting to contractor performance of Department of Defense activities and functions.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1280 proposed by Senator Kennedy.
